Title: The Little Foxes
Writer: Lillian Hellman (by), Lillian Hellman (screen play), Arthur Kober (additional scenes and dialogue), Dorothy Parker (additional scenes and dialogue), Alan Campbell (additional scenes and dialogue)
Actors: Bette Davis, Herbert Marshall, Teresa Wright, Richard Carlson
Plot: The ruthless, moneyed Hubbard clan lives in, and poisons, their part of the deep South at the turn of the twentieth century.
